data.Name: Krewella
data.Bio: Krewella is an electro group from Chicago, USA, comprised of sisters Jahan and Yasmine Yousaf, formerly joined by producer Rain Man. Making their debut in the summer of 2011, the trio instantly exploded onto the electro scene with their genre defying releases. Seamlessly merging infectious melodies with snarling dubstep drops, Krewella defines norms in EDM music. Onstage, the energy of Krewella's DJ sets is contagious. With unrelenting growling bass, fans will find themselves raging harder than they ever have before. Read more on Last.fm
